ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby gone missing?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have a question - I have seen many song lists stating that both Kelin s Lugubrious Lament and Kelin s Lucid Lullaby are only found in Kelethin. I did not
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have a question -

I have seen many song lists stating that both Kelin's Lugubrious Lament and
Kelin's Lucid Lullaby are only found in Kelethin. I did not see it in
Freeport so i went to Kelethin and sure enough it was there. That was around
lvl 9.

Now I am lvl 14, and was looking forward to purchasing Lullaby. So i had a
friend gate me to G Faydark just for this song, and found that the merchant
selling high level songs has neither one now. I also heard that maybe one of
the merchants was missing. Maybe he went for a walk (I've seen that before,
but never with spell merchants). I seem to remember seeing Lullaby there at
the time I purchased Lament.

Does anyone know what the deal is with this? I want to get this song badly,
but unless i get help I will have to possibly travel all the way to Erudin.
A petition brought a response from a guide saying "you'll have to find out
for yourself", of course. It's just annoying when you are sure the song was
there. It threw me off enough finding that since beta, our songs have been
scattered across the world - which can be ok, it gives you a reason to
travel.

Did they move it? Was the merchant out having a drink at the local pub?
Anyone? Thanks in advance!

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 14th Chorus
Veeshan
